showScoreExcerpt:
"The burning star at the center of the story, played by a luminous Condola Rashad, is too calm, too quiet, too sane for us to care much about...Her rationality takes a lot of emotional stuffing out of the story, and the series of somewhat disconnected scenes have a strangely becalming effect. The trial hits home, but the final moments of emotion donâ€™t quite make up for the smooth ride that comes before...The cast is, across the board, excellent."
